00001 <?php
00025 function & XML_serialize(&$data, $level = 0, $prior_key = NULL){
00026         #assumes a hash, keys are the variable names
00027         $xml_serialized_string = "";
00028         while(list($key, $value) = each($data)){
00029                 $inline = false;
00030                 $numeric_array = false;
00031                 $attributes = "";
00032                 #echo "My current key is '$key', called with prior key '$prior_key'<br>";
00033                 if(!strstr($key, " attr")){ #if it's not an attribute
00034                         if(array_key_exists("$key attr", $data)){
00035                                 while(list($attr_name, $attr_value) = each($data["$key attr"])){
00036                                         #echo "Found attribute $attribute_name with value $attribute_value<br>";
00037                                         $attr_value = &htmlspecialchars($attr_value, ENT_QUOTES);
00038                                         $attributes .= " $attr_name=\"$attr_value\"";
00039                                 }
00040                         }
00041 
00042                         if(is_numeric($key)){
00043                                 #echo "My current key ($key) is numeric. My parent key is '$prior_key'<br>";
00044                                 $key = $prior_key;
00045                         }else{
00046                                 #you can't have numeric keys at two levels in a row, so this is ok
00047                                 #echo "Checking to see if a numeric key exists in data.";
00048                                 if(is_array($value) and array_key_exists(0, $value)){
00049                                 #       echo " It does! Calling myself as a result of a numeric array.<br>";
00050                                         $numeric_array = true;
00051                                         $xml_serialized_string .= XML_serialize($value, $level, $key);
00052                                 }
00053                                 #echo "<br>";
00054                         }
00055 
00056                         if(!$numeric_array){
00057                                 $xml_serialized_string .= str_repeat("\t", $level) . "<$key$attributes>";
00058 
00059                                 if(is_array($value)){
00060                                         $xml_serialized_string .= "\r\n" . XML_serialize($value, $level+1);
00061                                 }else{
00062                                         $inline = true;
00063                                         $xml_serialized_string .= htmlspecialchars($value);
00064                                 }
00065 
00066                                 $xml_serialized_string .= (!$inline ? str_repeat("\t", $level) : "") . "</$key>\r\n";
00067                         }
00068                 }else{
00069                         #echo "Skipping attribute record for key $key<bR>";
00070                 }
00071         }
00072         if($level == 0){
00073                 $xml_serialized_string = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" ?>\r\n" . $xml_serialized_string;
00074                 return $xml_serialized_string;
00075         }else{
00076                 return $xml_serialized_string;
00077         }
00078 }

00080 class XML {
00081         var $parser; #a reference to the XML parser
00082         var $document; #the entire XML structure built up so far
00083         var $current; #a pointer to the current item - what is this
00084         var $parent; #a pointer to the current parent - the parent will be an array
00085         var $parents; #an array of the most recent parent at each level
00086 
00087         var $last_opened_tag;
00088 
00089         function XML($data=null){
00090                 $this->parser = xml_parser_create();
00091 
00092                 xml_parser_set_option ($this->parser, XML_OPTION_CASE_FOLDING, 0);
00093                 xml_set_object($this->parser, &$this);
00094                 xml_set_element_handler($this->parser, "open", "close");
00095                 xml_set_character_data_handler($this->parser, "data");
00096 #               register_shutdown_function(array(&$this, 'destruct'));
00097         }
00098 
00099         function destruct(){
00100                 xml_parser_free($this->parser);
00101         }
00102 
00103         function parse($data){
00104                 $this->document = array();
00105                 $this->parent = &$this->document;
00106                 $this->parents = array();
00107                 $this->last_opened_tag = NULL;
00108                 xml_parse($this->parser, $data);
00109                 return $this->document;
00110         }
00111 
00112         function open($parser, $tag, $attributes){
00113                 #echo "Opening tag $tag<br>\n";
00114                 $this->data = "";
00115                 $this->last_opened_tag = $tag; #tag is a string
00116                 if(array_key_exists($tag, $this->parent)){
00117                         #echo "There's already an instance of '$tag' at the current level ($level)<br>\n";
00118                         if(is_array($this->parent[$tag]) and array_key_exists(0, $this->parent[$tag])){ #if the keys are numeric
00119                                 #need to make sure they're numeric (account for attributes)
00120                                 $key = count_numeric_items($this->parent[$tag]);
00121                                 #echo "There are $key instances: the keys are numeric.<br>\n";
00122                         }else{
00123                                 #echo "There is only one instance. Shifting everything around<br>\n";
00124                                 $temp = &$this->parent[$tag];
00125                                 unset($this->parent[$tag]);
00126                                 $this->parent[$tag][0] = &$temp;
00127 
00128                                 if(array_key_exists("$tag attr", $this->parent)){
00129                                         #shift the attributes around too if they exist
00130                                         $temp = &$this->parent["$tag attr"];
00131                                         unset($this->parent["$tag attr"]);
00132                                         $this->parent[$tag]["0 attr"] = &$temp;
00133                                 }
00134                                 $key = 1;
00135                         }
00136                         $this->parent = &$this->parent[$tag];
00137                 }else{
00138                         $key = $tag;
00139                 }
00140                 if($attributes){
00141                         $this->parent["$key attr"] = $attributes;
00142                 }
00143 
00144                 $this->parent[$key] = array();
00145                 $this->parent = &$this->parent[$key];
00146                 array_unshift($this->parents, &$this->parent);
00147         }
00148 
00149         function data($parser, $data){
00150                 #echo "Data is '", htmlspecialchars($data), "'<br>\n";
00151                 if($this->last_opened_tag != NULL){
00152                         $this->data .= $data;
00153                 }
00154         }
00155 
00156         function close($parser, $tag){
00157                 #echo "Close tag $tag<br>\n";
00158                 if($this->last_opened_tag == $tag){
00159                         $this->parent = $this->data;
00160                         $this->last_opened_tag = NULL;
00161                 }
00162                 array_shift($this->parents);
00163                 $this->parent = &$this->parents[0];
00164         }
00165 }

00167 function & XML_unserialize(&$xml){
00168         $xml_parser = new XML();
00169         $data = &$xml_parser->parse(&$xml);
00170         $xml_parser->destruct();
00171         return $data;
00172 }

00174 function & XMLRPC_parse(&$request){
00175         if(defined('XMLRPC_DEBUG') and XMLRPC_DEBUG){
00176                 XMLRPC_debug('XMLRPC_parse', "<p>Received the following raw request:</p>" . XMLRPC_show($request, 'print_r', true));
00177         }
00178         $data = &XML_unserialize(&$request);
00179         if(defined('XMLRPC_DEBUG') and XMLRPC_DEBUG){
00180                 XMLRPC_debug('XMLRPC_parse', "<p>Returning the following parsed request:</p>" . XMLRPC_show($data, 'print_r', true));
00181         }
00182         return $data;
00183 }

00185 function & XMLRPC_prepare($data, $type = NULL){
00186         if(is_array($data)){
00187                 $num_elements = count($data);
00188                 if((array_key_exists(0, $data) or !$num_elements) and $type != 'struct'){ #it's an array
00189                         if(!$num_elements){ #if the array is empty
00190                                 $returnvalue =  array('array' => array('data' => NULL));
00191                         }else{
00192                                 $returnvalue['array']['data']['value'] = array();
00193                                 $temp = &$returnvalue['array']['data']['value'];
00194                                 $count = count_numeric_items($data);
00195                                 for($n=0; $n<$count; $n++){
00196                                         $type = NULL;
00197                                         if(array_key_exists("$n type", $data)){
00198                                                 $type = $data["$n type"];
00199                                         }
00200                                         $temp[$n] = XMLRPC_prepare(&$data[$n], $type);
00201                                 }
00202                         }
00203                 }else{ #it's a struct
00204                         if(!$num_elements){ #if the struct is empty
00205                                 $returnvalue = array('struct' => NULL);
00206                         }else{
00207                                 $returnvalue['struct']['member'] = array();
00208                                 $temp = &$returnvalue['struct']['member'];
00209                                 while(list($key, $value) = each($data)){
00210                                         if(substr($key, -5) != ' type'){ #if it's not a type specifier
00211                                                 $type = NULL;
00212                                                 if(array_key_exists("$key type", $data)){
00213                                                         $type = $data["$key type"];
00214                                                 }
00215                                                 $temp[] = array('name' => $key, 'value' => XMLRPC_prepare(&$value, $type));
00216                                         }
00217                                 }
00218                         }
00219                 }
00220         }else{ #it's a scalar
00221                 if(!$type){
00222                         if(is_int($data)){
00223                                 $returnvalue['int'] = $data;
00224                                 return $returnvalue;
00225                         }elseif(is_float($data)){
00226                                 $returnvalue['double'] = $data;
00227                                 return $returnvalue;
00228                         }elseif(is_bool($data)){
00229                                 $returnvalue['boolean'] = ($data ? 1 : 0);
00230                                 return $returnvalue;
00231                         }elseif(preg_match('/^\d{8}T\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}$/', $data, $matches)){ #it's a date
00232                                 $returnvalue['dateTime.iso8601'] = $data;
00233                                 return $returnvalue;
00234                         }elseif(is_string($data)){
00235                                 $returnvalue['string'] = htmlspecialchars($data);
00236                                 return $returnvalue;
00237                         }
00238                 }else{
00239                         $returnvalue[$type] = htmlspecialchars($data);
00240                 }
00241         }
00242         return $returnvalue;
00243 }

00245 function & XMLRPC_adjustValue(&$current_node){
00246         if(is_array($current_node)){
00247                 if(isset($current_node['array'])){
00248                         if(!is_array($current_node['array']['data'])){
00249                                 #If there are no elements, return an empty array
00250                                 return array();
00251                         }else{
00252                                 #echo "Getting rid of array -> data -> value<br>\n";
00253                                 $temp = &$current_node['array']['data']['value'];
00254                                 if(is_array($temp) and array_key_exists(0, $temp)){
00255                                         $count = count($temp);
00256                                         for($n=0;$n<$count;$n++){
00257                                                 $temp2[$n] = &XMLRPC_adjustValue(&$temp[$n]);
00258                                         }
00259                                         $temp = &$temp2;
00260                                 }else{
00261                                         $temp2 = &XMLRPC_adjustValue(&$temp);
00262                                         $temp = array(&$temp2);
00263                                         #I do the temp assignment because it avoids copying,
00264                                         # since I can put a reference in the array
00265                                         #PHP's reference model is a bit silly, and I can't just say:
00266                                         # $temp = array(&XMLRPC_adjustValue(&$temp));
00267                                 }
00268                         }
00269                 }elseif(isset($current_node['struct'])){
00270                         if(!is_array($current_node['struct'])){
00271                                 #If there are no members, return an empty array
00272                                 return array();
00273                         }else{
00274                                 #echo "Getting rid of struct -> member<br>\n";
00275                                 $temp = &$current_node['struct']['member'];
00276                                 if(is_array($temp) and array_key_exists(0, $temp)){
00277                                         $count = count($temp);
00278                                         for($n=0;$n<$count;$n++){
00279                                                 #echo "Passing name {$temp[$n][name]}. Value is: " . show($temp[$n][value], var_dump, true) . "<br>\n";
00280                                                 $temp2[$temp[$n]['name']] = &XMLRPC_adjustValue(&$temp[$n]['value']);
00281                                                 #echo "adjustValue(): After assigning, the value is " . show($temp2[$temp[$n]['name']], var_dump, true) . "<br>\n";
00282                                         }
00283                                 }else{
00284                                         #echo "Passing name $temp[name]<br>\n";
00285                                         $temp2[$temp['name']] = &XMLRPC_adjustValue(&$temp['value']);
00286                                 }
00287                                 $temp = &$temp2;
00288                         }
00289                 }else{
00290                         $types = array('string', 'int', 'i4', 'double', 'dateTime.iso8601', 'base64', 'boolean');
00291                         $fell_through = true;
00292                         foreach($types as $type){
00293                                 if(array_key_exists($type, $current_node)){
00294                                         #echo "Getting rid of '$type'<br>\n";
00295                                         $temp = &$current_node[$type];
00296                                         #echo "adjustValue(): The current node is set with a type of $type<br>\n";
00297                                         $fell_through = false;
00298                                         break;
00299                                 }
00300                         }
00301                         if($fell_through){
00302                                 $type = 'string';
00303                                 #echo "Fell through! Type is $type<br>\n";
00304                         }
00305                         switch ($type){
00306                                 case 'int': case 'i4': $temp = (int)$temp;    break;
00307                                 case 'string':         $temp = (string)$temp; break;
00308                                 case 'double':         $temp = (double)$temp; break;
00309                                 case 'boolean':        $temp = (bool)$temp;   break;
00310                         }
00311                 }
00312         }else{
00313                 $temp = (string)$current_node;
00314         }
00315         return $temp;
00316 }

00318 function XMLRPC_getParams($request){
00319         if(!is_array($request['methodCall']['params'])){
00320                 #If there are no parameters, return an empty array
00321                 return array();
00322         }else{
00323                 #echo "Getting rid of methodCall -> params -> param<br>\n";
00324                 $temp = &$request['methodCall']['params']['param'];
00325                 if(is_array($temp) and array_key_exists(0, $temp)){
00326                         $count = count($temp);
00327                         for($n = 0; $n < $count; $n++){
00328                                 #echo "Serializing parameter $n<br>";
00329                                 $temp2[$n] = &XMLRPC_adjustValue(&$temp[$n]['value']);
00330                         }
00331                 }else{
00332                         $temp2[0] = &XMLRPC_adjustValue($temp['value']);
00333                 }
00334                 $temp = &$temp2;
00335                 return $temp;
00336         }
00337 }

00344 function XMLRPC_request($site, $location, $methodName, $params = NULL, $user_agent = NULL){
00345         $site = explode(':', $site);
00346         if(isset($site[1]) and is_numeric($site[1])){
00347                 $port = $site[1];
00348         }else{
00349                 $port = 80;
00350         }
00351         $site = $site[0];
00352 
00353         $data["methodCall"]["methodName"] = $methodName;
00354         $param_count = count($params);
00355         if(!$param_count){
00356                 $data["methodCall"]["params"] = NULL;
00357         }else{
00358                 for($n = 0; $n<$param_count; $n++){
00359                         $data["methodCall"]["params"]["param"][$n]["value"] = $params[$n];
00360                 }
00361         }
00362         $data = XML_serialize($data);
00363 
00364         if(defined('XMLRPC_DEBUG') and XMLRPC_DEBUG){
00365                 XMLRPC_debug('XMLRPC_request', "<p>Received the following parameter list to send:</p>" . XMLRPC_show($params, 'print_r', true));
00366         }
00367         $conn = fsockopen ($site, $port); #open the connection
00368         if(!$conn){ #if the connection was not opened successfully
00369                 if(defined('XMLRPC_DEBUG') and XMLRPC_DEBUG){
00370                         XMLRPC_debug('XMLRPC_request', "<p>Connection failed: Couldn't make the connection to $site.</p>");
00371                 }
00372                 return array(false, array('faultCode'=>10532, 'faultString'=>"Connection failed: Couldn't make the connection to $site."));
00373         }else{
00374                 $headers =
00375                         "POST $location HTTP/1.0\r\n" .
00376                         "Host: $site\r\n" .
00377                         "Connection: close\r\n" .
00378                         ($user_agent ? "User-Agent: $user_agent\r\n" : '') .
00379                         "Content-Type: text/xml\r\n" .
00380                         "Content-Length: " . strlen($data) . "\r\n\r\n";
00381 
00382                 fputs($conn, "$headers");
00383                 fputs($conn, $data);
00384 
00385                 if(defined('XMLRPC_DEBUG') and XMLRPC_DEBUG){
00386                         XMLRPC_debug('XMLRPC_request', "<p>Sent the following request:</p>\n\n" . XMLRPC_show($headers . $data, 'print_r', true));
00387                 }
00388 
00389                 #socket_set_blocking ($conn, false);
00390                 $response = "";
00391                 while(!feof($conn)){
00392                         $response .= fgets($conn, 1024);
00393                 }
00394                 fclose($conn);
00395 
00396                 #strip headers off of response
00397                 $data = XML_unserialize(substr($response, strpos($response, "\r\n\r\n")+4));
00398 
00399                 if(defined('XMLRPC_DEBUG') and XMLRPC_DEBUG){
00400                         XMLRPC_debug('XMLRPC_request', "<p>Received the following response:</p>\n\n" . XMLRPC_show($response, 'print_r', true) . "<p>Which was serialized into the following data:</p>\n\n" . XMLRPC_show($data, 'print_r', true));
00401                 }
00402                 if(isset($data['methodResponse']['fault'])){
00403                         $return =  array(false, XMLRPC_adjustValue(&$data['methodResponse']['fault']['value']));
00404                         if(defined('XMLRPC_DEBUG') and XMLRPC_DEBUG){
00405                                 XMLRPC_debug('XMLRPC_request', "<p>Returning:</p>\n\n" . XMLRPC_show($return, 'var_dump', true));
00406                         }
00407                         return $return;
00408                 }else{
00409                         $return = array(true, XMLRPC_adjustValue(&$data['methodResponse']['params']['param']['value']));
00410                         if(defined('XMLRPC_DEBUG') and XMLRPC_DEBUG){
00411                                 XMLRPC_debug('XMLRPC_request', "<p>Returning:</p>\n\n" . XMLRPC_show($return, 'var_dump', true));
00412                         }
00413                         return $return;
00414                 }
00415         }
00416 }

00418 function XMLRPC_response($return_value, $server = NULL){
00419         $data["methodResponse"]["params"]["param"]["value"] = &$return_value;
00420         $return = XML_serialize(&$data);
00421 
00422         if(defined('XMLRPC_DEBUG') and XMLRPC_DEBUG){
00423                 XMLRPC_debug('XMLRPC_response', "<p>Received the following data to return:</p>\n\n" . XMLRPC_show($return_value, 'print_r', true));
00424         }
00425 
00426         header("Connection: close");
00427         header("Content-Length: " . strlen($return));
00428         header("Content-Type: text/xml");
00429         header("Date: " . date("r"));
00430         if($server){
00431                 header("Server: $server");
00432         }
00433 
00434         if(defined('XMLRPC_DEBUG') and XMLRPC_DEBUG){
00435                 XMLRPC_debug('XMLRPC_response', "<p>Sent the following response:</p>\n\n" . XMLRPC_show($return, 'print_r', true));
00436         }
00437         echo $return;
00438 }

00440 function XMLRPC_error($faultCode, $faultString, $server = NULL){
00441         $array["methodResponse"]["fault"]["value"]["struct"]["member"] = array();
00442         $temp = &$array["methodResponse"]["fault"]["value"]["struct"]["member"];
00443         $temp[0]["name"] = "faultCode";
00444         $temp[0]["value"]["int"] = $faultCode;
00445         $temp[1]["name"] = "faultString";
00446         $temp[1]["value"]["string"] = $faultString;
00447 
00448         $return = XML_serialize($array);
00449 
00450         header("Connection: close");
00451         header("Content-Length: " . strlen($return));
00452         header("Content-Type: text/xml");
00453         header("Date: " . date("r"));
00454         if($server){
00455                 header("Server: $server");
00456         }
00457         if(defined('XMLRPC_DEBUG') and XMLRPC_DEBUG){
00458                 XMLRPC_debug('XMLRPC_error', "<p>Sent the following error response:</p>\n\n" . XMLRPC_show($return, 'print_r', true));
00459         }
00460         echo $return;
00461 }

00463 function XMLRPC_convert_timestamp_to_iso8601($timestamp){
00464         #takes a unix timestamp and converts it to iso8601 required by XMLRPC
00465         #an example iso8601 datetime is "20010822T03:14:33"
00466         return date("Ymd\TH:i:s", $timestamp);
00467 }
00468 
00469 function XMLRPC_convert_iso8601_to_timestamp($iso8601){
00470         return strtotime($iso8601);
00471 }

00473 function count_numeric_items(&$array){
00474         return is_array($array) ? count(array_filter(array_keys($array), 'is_numeric')) : 0;
00475 }

00477 function XMLRPC_debug($function_name, $debug_message){
00478         $GLOBALS['XMLRPC_DEBUG_INFO'][] = array($function_name, $debug_message);
00479 }

00481 function XMLRPC_debug_print(){
00482         if($GLOBALS['XMLRPC_DEBUG_INFO']){
00483                 echo "<table border=\"1\" width=\"100%\">\n";
00484                 foreach($GLOBALS['XMLRPC_DEBUG_INFO'] as $debug){
00485                         echo "<tr><th style=\"vertical-align: top\">$debug[0]</th><td>$debug[1]</td></tr>\n";
00486                 }
00487                 echo "</table>\n";
00488                 unset($GLOBALS['XMLRPC_DEBUG_INFO']);
00489         }else{
00490                 echo "<p>No debugging information available yet.</p>";
00491         }
00492 }

00494 function XMLRPC_show($data, $func = "print_r", $return_str = false){
00495         ob_start();
00496         $func($data);
00497         $output = ob_get_contents();
00498         ob_end_clean();
00499         if($return_str){
00500                 return "<pre>" . htmlspecialchars($output) . "</pre>\n";
00501         }else{
00502                 echo "<pre>", htmlspecialchars($output), "</pre>\n";
00503         }
00504 }
